output.sentences: The table was set for tonights party for the bar drinks.
The hit of the day was for sure going to be my special chili.
I couldn't wait until it was time for socializing with my guests.
WHile it was still light out, we decided to go ahead and put the candles on the cake.
It was a success, as the party turnout was huge.
